entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • NativeAOT is much slower that JIT version #64856
  • Publishing Blazor WASM with AOT enabled failed at "emcc --version" #64854
  • Several classes in System.Private.Xml are creating StringBuilders when formatting simple types like DateTime,TimeSpan #64853
  • XML Deserialization in Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration - Parity with Data Contracts #64840
    7.0.0

Closed

  • The framework 'Microsoft.AspNetCore.App', version '6.0.0' (x64) was not found #64136
  • Add ArrayBuilder<T> #37852
    Future
  • Is GetAwaiter().GetResult() cause a deadlock ? #64849
  • Support for oracle solaris on SPARC 64bit processor #7220
    Future
  • NativeAOT: Compiler produce warnings #64824

PullRequests

Created

  • For MultiRegStoreLoc prefer allocating a local def to the same register as src #64857
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Mark promoted SIMD locals used by HWIs as DNER #64855
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] [mobile] Add extra HttpClientHandler linker substitution #64852
    area-System.Net, linkable-framework
  • Turn off flaky RapidJSON optimization on x64 #64851
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Use generic `Enum` methods when possible. #64850
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Turn off -ffp-contract on Unix #64847
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Handle direct addresses for statics in `IsFieldAddr` #64846
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] improve I64 memory access #64845
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • JIT: contained memory safety analysis fixes and improvements #64843
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Deduplicate several special classes of JIT/Methodical tests #64842
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Deduplicate project files with the same name in different folders #64841
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fix System.Runtime reference versions and several test project names under JIT/Methodical #64839
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Print out the ws: address #64838
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Clean up several special tests under JIT/Methodical #64837
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 7.0.0

Merged

  • fix broken outerloop test #64858
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add ActivitySource support to DiagnosticsHandler #64753
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Set up an analyzer exception filter to make intermittent failures more actionable. #64836
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [wasm] Fix scenario specific tests #64800
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/6.0] Update helix queues #64721
    area-Infrastructure-libraries

Updated

  • [API Implementation]: Use TimeSpan everywhere we use an int for seconds, milliseconds, and timeouts (Group 1/3) #64860
  • [release/6.0] Fix crash when VS4Mac is debugging VS4Mac arm64 #64086
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.3
  • Unroll String.Equals for constant input [0..16] length #64821
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add `runtime-wasm` pipeline #64830
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update RateLimiter queues on cancellation #64825
    area-System.Threading
  • [JIT] More ARM64 comparison instruction optimizations with Vector.Zero #64783
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Initial roll out of !! #64720
    area-Meta
  • [API Implementation]: Support for Intel SHA extensions #62999
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Streamline bool.TryParse/Format #64782
    area-System.Runtime
  • Make the `EventSource` generator incremental et.al. #64579
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, community-contribution
  • Remove spin lock from SocketAsyncEventArgs on Windows #64770
    area-System.Net.Sockets, tenet-performance
  • [mobile] Add extra HttpClientHandler linker substitution #64818
    area-System.Net.Http, linkable-framework, size-reduction
  • Fix missing zero-offset sequences and add checking #64805
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Take into account zero-offset field sequences when propagating locals #64701
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Introduce `GenTreeDebugOperKind` #64498
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add support for `TYP_BYREF` `LCL_FLD`s to VN #64501
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Another size estimate fix for `mov`s #64826
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Do not hoist constants if they will not be CSEed #64039
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Copy propagation tweaking #64378
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Morph `ASG(ONE_FLD_STRUCT, CALL)` using `BITCAST` #61049
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use a simpler representation for array addresses after morph #64581
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [draft][wasm] InvokeJSFunctionByName alternate design #64493
    NO REVIEW, arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Switch default modules to es6 #62740
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • [API Implementation]: DirectoryInfo.CopyTo / Directory.Copy #62375
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [API Implementation]: SafeFileHandle overloads for SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-vm directory #62885
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [wasm] Add exports to workaround emscripten bug #64807
    area-Build-mono
  • Add S.S.C.Cose with COSE Sign1 support #64461
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [mono] Allow missing assemblies in llvmonly+interp mode. #64294
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [Mono][Test] Collapse mono runtime tests into single builds using global-build-job template #62863
    area-Infrastructure
  • Improve incremental build times of the libraries subset #64000
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • [tests][eventpipe] Port over Dotnet/Diagnostics to enable eventpipe tests on Android #64358
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Implement TLS1.3 delayed client cert requests on Linux #64268
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-05
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] For WASI are we going to need another build of the C parts of the runtime? #1848
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM]: Question fcntl F_DUPFD_CLOEXEC and WASI #1847
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Surface message for missing EMSDK #1839

Updated

  • More usable reflection-free mode #1325

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Support wildcard versions in baseline package validation #23772

Closed

  • Windows Update error 0x80070643 trying to install "2021-11 .NET 5.0.12 Update for x64 Client (KB5007884)" #23307

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Inline parameter hint is off when incorrect number of arguments is passed #59317

Closed

  • Refactor fails with horrible message #43105
    17.2
  • "Delegate invocation can be simplified" refactoring should have a different title from the analyzer #31826
    Backlog
  • Generate constructor not taking into account NRT for type parameters #43273
    Backlog
  • Find all references on a class name display duplicate records #43500
    Backlog
  • There is a problem with simplifying interpolation #42800
    Backlog
  • Automatic ternary conversion for "true-/false-" valued cases #42380
    Backlog
  • Failed to fix "Use compound assignment" for solution #40673
    Backlog
  • InvalidCastException from AbstractAddParameterCheckCodeRefactoringProvider`5.UpdateDocumentForRefactoringAsync #59315
  • 'Generate Equals' should use `is object` rather than `!= null` #39253
    Backlog
  • Fix and enable VSTHRD100 "Avoid async void methods" #38545
    Backlog
  • The current TransactionScope is already complete. Near Microsoft.VisualStudio.GraphModel.GraphTransactionScope.. ctor(Transaction transaction) #38158
    Backlog
  • Exception thrown when navigating to implementation from interface #37923
    Backlog
  • AddNullCheck should use new `parameter!` syntax #37067
    Backlog
  • DeclarationNameCompletionProvider should suggest names for nullable types #37392
    Backlog
  • AddParensForClarity should consider `switch` expressions like `await e switch ...` #35636
    Backlog
  • Add Convert anonymous type to class refactoring for VB #35861
    Backlog
  • "Go to implementation" throws AggregateException #35980
    Backlog
  • Generated method is put inside the preprocessor directives #59314
  • Generated IEquatable code should use `is null` for null check #31283
    Backlog
  • Autocompletion for pattern matches in switch #31367
    Backlog
  • Intellisense missing ref/int when trying to write lambda #58906
    17.2
  • SyntaxGenerator.WithModifiers is not adding NotOverridable modifier for VB method #23410
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove dependency on EditorFeatures from Remote.ServieHub project - take 3 #59316
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev16.9-vs-deps to release/dev16.11-vs-deps #59307
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add FindUsagesOptions and thread option getter through FAR services #59306
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Improve loc string. #59296
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Ensure we emit a reference-equality check against null when generating .Equals #59300
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Update paths in `.vscode/launch.json` due to TFM changes #59108
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to main #59313
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1-vs-deps to release/dev17.2 #59311
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to main #59312
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Prevent certain keywords from appearing in case clause #59298
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1-vs-deps to release/dev17.2 #59310
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #59309
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix parameter completion for partially written lambdas #59277
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #59308
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Associate module EnC diagnostics with changed documents #59273
    Area-Interactive, Approved to merge, 17.1
  • Insert release/dev17.2 branch to VS rel branch #59287
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Add test showing issue doesn't repro #59295
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Run MacOS CI on 10.15 #59305
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Run MacOS CI on 10.15 #59304
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Merge main to features/vs2022-theme #59320
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/semi-auto-props #59319
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/list-patterns #59318
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • WIP: Make solution options global #59168
    Area-IDE
  • Handle more cases in both new line formatting and curly brace completion #53222
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Enable CA2009: Do not call ToImmutableCollection on an ImmutableCollection value #53141
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Suggest parameter names from matching overloads #52801
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Fix semantic model to handle ParenthesizedVariableDesignation #54439
    Area-Compilers
  • Add CompilerGeneratedAttribute to record members #58542
    Area-Compilers, Community, New Language Feature - Records
  • Don't remove cast when converting method group to object #58920
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Semantic Snippets: Console snippet first look #59303
    Area-IDE
  • Ensure command handler doesn't index out of bounds when at end of file #59302
    Area-IDE
  • Add prefer trailing commas code-style option #54859
    Area-IDE
  • Separate Roslyn.Diagnostica.Analyzers version from PerformanceSensitive #59033
    Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • Use interpolated string handler for Contract.ThrowIf methods #58173
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Add support for unsafe local functions in IDE0062 code fix #59297
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Set OutputEncoding to UTF8 #59032
    Area-Compilers
  • Function pointer calling convention IDE support #59062
    Area-IDE, Community
  • [semi-auto-props]: Add more tests (GetMembers, speculative semantic model) #59270
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • [semi-auto-props]: Avoid using `IsAutoProperty` when possible #59109
    Area-Compilers
  • Remove some outdated configurations in tools #52800
    Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • Support multi-caret when inserting doc comments #54741
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Cascade between position record parameters and properties. #59293
    Area-IDE
  • Fix fading span for unnecessary using #59276
    Area-IDE
  • Rename options refactoring #58403
    Area-IDE
  • Avoid 0-length spans #59299
    Area-IDE
  • Safely create VirtualCharSequence from string in StackFrameParser #59283
    Area-IDE
  • fix restore on nuget 6.2.0.33 #59230
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Cache the unescaped form of globalconfig section names #59301
    Area-Compilers
  • Follow up on LDM decisions made 2022-01-26 #59229
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Utf8StringLiterals

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Missing dispose in security area #40017
  • Minimal Workers #40013
  • Razor runtime compilation doesnt work second time with virtual file path providers? #40012
  • Is there a way to update the user's claims when using OpenID? #40011

Closed

  • RenderTreeBuilder cannot wire up EventCallback via reflection #40008
  • LogLevel Warning is somewhat verbose for LoggerEventIds.VerifyUserTokenFailed in the UserManager #39910
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Builder.WebHost.UseUrls does not seem to override default url #38185
    6.0.x

PullRequests

Created

  • Better way to detect "Failed to start the HttpConnection before stop() was called." #40018
    area-signalr, community-contribution
  • FileBufferingReadStream - CanRead + CanSeek checks _disposed #40016
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Do not build when publishing in Helix CI jobs (alternative) #40010
    area-infrastructure
  • Add nullable annotations to Identity.Extensions #40007
    area-identity
  • Error when Http/1.0 attempts to upgrade #40006
    area-runtime
  • Fix Kestrel support for custom EndPoints #40003
    area-runtime
  • Log IIS BadHttpRequestExceptions at debug level #40002
    area-runtime

Merged

  • Refactor : Enable CA2249 #40009
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, 7.0-preview2
  • typo: rename ComponentParametersShouldBeAutoProperies to ComponentParametersShouldBeAutoProperties #40014
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 7.0-preview2
  • Change LogLevel Warning to Debug for LoggerEventIds.VerifyUserTokenFailed in UserManager #40000
    area-identity, community-contribution, 7.0-preview2
  • Allow pdb delta to be optionally included in a hot reload payload #39742
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 6.0.3
  • Avoid request body rate timeout in flaky test #39999
    area-runtime, servers-kestrel, 7.0-preview2
  • Don't compare SequencePosition instances #39975
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview2

Updated

  • [WIP] libnethost prototyping #39810
    area-runtime
  • Do not build when publishing in Helix CI jobs #39998
    area-infrastructure
  • Complete inner Pipewriter in HttpLoggingMiddleware #39989
    area-runtime
  • [release/6.0] Don't reuse Pipe buffer when body is read #39376
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 6.0.x
  • Faster ParseHeaders #39216
    area-runtime
  • [release/6.0] [blazor][debugger] Fixing vs-js-debugger: redirect ws to http is not supported anymore #39996
    area-blazor, * NO MERGE *, 6.0.x

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Proposal: Introduce Shell as the default way of using/learning .NET MAUI (templates, documentation, etc.) #4522
  • Referencing Blazor wasm hosted project in Blazor MAUI project #4521
  • CollectionView ItemSpacing cannot be set below an arbitrary value #4520

Closed

  • WebView needs ExecuteJavascript support #4215

PullRequests

Created

  • If handler has a ViewController then return the View for the ViewController when calling ToPlatform #4523
  • Flyout should always update the details when it changes. #4519
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #4518
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • Remove MS.Extensions.Hosting from Maui #4505
    area/hosting 🧩

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-05
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • The info should be '.NET 6.0' rather than '.NET 5.0' on .NET 6 Preview 4 SDK installation wizard on CHS OS #10344

PullRequests

Merged

  • Update installer tables to include 6.0.3xx #13174

Updated
